text: Graciela Flores "Grace" Napolitano (born December 4, 1936) is an American politician. She was the U.S. Representative for from 1999 until 2025. She is a member of the Democratic Party. She is a member of the Congressional Progressive Caucus. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congresswoman Grace Napolitano official U.S. House site * Grace Napolitano for Congress * * * Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from California Category:Politicians from Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Brownsville, Texas
title: Grace Napolitano
